sentences.en: Our product is a computer-based service.
sentences.cn: 我们的产品是一个基于计算机的服务。

sentences.en: The way to get there is with computer-based learning.
sentences.cn: 实现这个方法要配合以计算机为基础的学习。

sentences.en: This time 41 participants were given a very boring computer-based task to do.
sentences.cn: 这一次，41名参与者有一项非常无趣的基于计算机的任务要完成。
